DataListSpec.Name: Child Project Registered Children Data List
DataListSpec.Description: Data list to show a list of registered children on the child project page.
DataListSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataList.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATALIST_CHILDPROJECT_CHILDRENLIST_REGISTERED( @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, @CHILDLOOKUPID nvarchar(100) = null, @CHILDNAME nvarchar(200) = null, @RESERVATIONKEY nvarchar(100) = null, @AVAILABILITYCODE tinyint = null, @ELIGIBILITYCODE tinyint = null ) as begin set nocount on;
declare @eligibilityCodePending tinyint = 0 declare @eligibilityCodeEligible tinyint = 1
select FIELDOFFICEID, so.ID SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID, so.LOOKUPID CHILDLOOKUPID, so_child.NAME, ch_ext.REGISTRATIONDATE, so_child.AGE, so_child.GENDER, dbo.UFN_DATE_FROMFUZZYDATE (so_child.BIRTHDATE) BIRTHDATE, so.AVAILABILITY, so.ELIGIBILITY, case when dbo.UFN_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY_ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS(so.ID) > 0 then 'Sponsored' when AVAILABILITYCODE = 1 then 'Unsponsored - Reserved' else 'Unsponsored' end as SPONSORSHIPSTATUS, so_reserveprocess.NAME as RESERVATIONKEY, case when exists (select ID from dbo.USR_CHILDREACTIVATION where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = so.ID) then 1 else 0 end as REACTIVATED
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY so inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPLOCATION slocation on slocation.ID = so.SPONSORSHIPLOCATIONID inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILD so_child on so.ID = so_child.ID left outer join dbo.USR_CHILDEXTENSION ch_ext on so.ID = ch_ext.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYRESERVEPROCESS so_reserveprocess on so_reserveprocess.ID = so.RESERVATIONKEYID where FIELDOFFICEID = @CONTEXTID and ch_ext.REGISTRATIONDATE is not null and so.ELIGIBILITYCODE in (@eligibilityCodePending, @eligibilityCodeEligible) and (@CHILDLOOKUPID is null or so.LOOKUPID like '%' + @CHILDLOOKUPID + '%') and (@CHILDNAME is null or so_child.NAME like '%' + @CHILDNAME + '%') and (@AVAILABILITYCODE is null or so.AVAILABILITYCODE = @AVAILABILITYCODE) and (@ELIGIBILITYCODE is null or so.ELIGIBILITYCODE = @ELIGIBILITYCODE)
end
